Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology News
Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology News

Blog for the Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology at the Tandon School of Engineering (at the time of capture Tandon was known as the Polytechnic School of Engineering). The blog contains posts related to books by faculty, archives, engineering, management and finance, mathematics, scholarly publishing, science, tips and tools, technology, culture, society, and other library news. The blog dates back to 2007.
